ygData.subject: Soloing in Kaladim
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, on someone s advice, forget whom it was, but I made the trip to Kaladim to plumb the depths of Unrest. I m 14th level and just coming into my power right
ygData.messageBody:
Well, on someone's advice, forget whom it was, but I made the trip to
Kaladim to plumb the depths of Unrest. I'm 14th level and just coming into
my power right now. Right now the rest of the people in my group are between
3-5 levels below me. So I figure I'll just solo and get xps slower, but also
not hinder their progress either. Where should I go? I've gone to the
chessboard and killed pawns, bishops and their annoying pets, as well as the
odd King that shows up. A dwarven friend of mine was telling me how his 6
member lvl 10 party was completely wiped out in Unrest down to the last man.
I made the following conclusions:

a. Unrest is nasty
b. My dwarven friend's party is stupid for not running from something they
can't win

I can admire going out gloriously next to your comrade, but not when death
isn't permanent.

So, question, if I take my group into unrest what should I be looking to
kill? Is there somwhere else that is nearby that I should go instead? My
dwarf friend said to hit the steamfonts, suggestions?

Zalbar
14th Wizard
Solusek Ro
